Reviews.Title: Excellent Value!
Reviews.Author: MusicFan
Reviews.Content: For the money, it's hard to find a better value for a 19 inch LCD. This TV has a QAM tuner, clear picture, easy to navigate menu and decent audio quality. Well recommended. Also comes with  a two year warranty.

Reviews.Title: excellent value for the price
Reviews.Author: Jenna Alis Saunders "Jenna S."
Reviews.Content: I bought this after looking at 20 different TV sets for my desk, this was the best value on the shelf at bestbuy at the time, I'm quite happy with this TV, although I suggest watching it in low light or no light as it is an LCD without the LED technology it doesn't have the brightness for well lit rooms especially for DVD movies, but it does have an excellent picture especially for the price paid for it

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Jaylene Niles
Reviews.Content: Thought Insignia was a good brand, but it let me down. The color is faded, especially when you play dvd's on it! I can see why it was so affordable, it's like the saying goes, ya get what you pay for. Just for advise, be sure to check out the display ones in the store before buying online.
